data.title: From Which place I should try for Job?

qas.question: Dear Friends from India I have complete my course SAP-SD from Hyderabad but not getting any call from any company That so why i want to move either banglore or delhi. Would any one suggest me to that where I should go. Please help me to take decision which place will be good for getting frequently call and walk-In in sap sd. Arun

answers.text: Dear Arun, As per my knowledge the place do not matter much. You can upload your CV in jobsite ( naukri, monsterindia etc) and can get the calls. Most of the companies are willing to take the telephonic interview also (especially for the first technical round). The core of this market is knowledge. So practice as much as possible. Do let me know in case of any queries. Hope this helps you. Regards, Rakesh

answers.text: HelloPS R PS R PS R It is another case where you need to go to ABAPer with your clear specifications. Here the specifications can be like you want to list all such Orders which could be Similar other situation if any. Regards KJogeswaraRao KJogeswaraRao

data.title: Deliveries for which F8 has been done are appearing in VF04

qas.question: Dear all, Deliveries for which proforma invoice F8 has been done , are appearing in VF04. I know that +/- indicator is absent in VTFL. What other ways are there to adress the issue. Pl. help. regards.

answers.text: Hi, Whenever Proforma Invoices are created then the Order or delivery status remains open for invoicing. Example: Create a Proforma from delivery. Even then the delivey is open for invoicing. So Deliveries for which F8 has been done are appearing in VF04 is standard system behaviour. regards

data.title: fico/ps which one is responsible for COPA setting?

answers.text: Hi Aryan, Hi Aryan, According to me COPA setting is responsibility of FICO Consultant. COPA setting involves configuration of following topics which is mostly related to FICO. According to me COPA setting is responsibility of FICO Consultant. COPA setting involves configuration of following topics which is mostly related to FICO. Operating concern Operating concern Value fields Value fields Characteristics Characteristics COPA Master Data COPA Master Data Hierarchy / Derivation etc Hierarchy / Derivation etc Planning option in COPA Planning option in COPA Flow of Actual Value Flow of Actual Value Settlement Settlement Reporting Reporting Regards, Regards, Tushar Tushar

qas.question: Hi All, I'm trying to generate mass ROE's, we could successfully generate for the Semi Monthly and Bi weekly employees but getting the below error for many of our weekly employees though its generating successfully for some of the weekly employees, error is the same except the Recall date differs, I tried different options in block 14 to no avail. Can someone please help Expected Date Of Recall 01/01/2005 must be greater than Last Day For Which Paid

answers.text: Where do you keep the "Expected Date Of Recall" since that is not in any stardard field that I know of? Is it in IT0041? For one such employee, check the last day worked and compare it to the "Expected Date Of Recall".

data.title: Which Badi to use for the following IT0045 requirement

qas.question: HI guys, can anyone tell me which Badi I can use for the following purpose Purpose and Description: Create a new custom field in infotype 0045 u2013 PAYEE KEY. Field should be similar to field P0057-EMFSL u2013 payee key for bank transfer. This field refers to configuration tables: V_T521B u2013 payee key V_T521C u2013 payee authorization for infotypes.

answers.text: Hi, For enhancing standard with additional fields, you need to use PM01 - Infotype maintenance screen instead of BADI. Please search forum on PM01 usage, you'll find plentry of knowledge. If you have some specific problems while enhancing, please donot hesitate to ask. Regards, Dilek

data.title: Which cost report can display the data without allocatioin data from overhead?

qas.question: When we run this report(S_ALR_87013611), for certain cost centre the report shows full cost included overhead allocation cost. Can we show "direct cost only" for certain cost centre without overhead allocation cost even after CCA Allocation? When we run this report(S_ALR_87013611), for certain cost centre the report shows full cost included overhead allocation cost. Can we show "direct cost only" for certain cost centre without overhead allocation cost even after CCA Allocation? S_ALR_87013611

answers.text: Hi, You can use S_ALR_87013615 for example, which breaks the costs by partner; thus, enabling the view without allocation costs. Also, S_ALR_87013616 should be OK for this. Regards, Eli

data.title: How to find out through which tcode TR is created.

qas.question: Hi Friends, We have one custom code to create TR for staging of RM for the production. I want to find out whether TR is created through custom tcode or by standard transation. How can I find out this. Thanks, Kiran

answers.text: Such information is not captured in the TR tables. If you require this info then you may write some text into the header text of a TR

data.title: How to specify the name for SPOOL file, which is creating from Z prog.?

qas.question: Hi Experts, Am creating a SPOOL file from my Z prog. below is the code, fine, its creating. DATA param TYPE pri_params. DATA param TYPE pri_params. NEW-PAGE PRINT ON NEW-PAGE PRINT ON PARAMETERS param PARAMETERS param NO DIALOG. NO DIALOG. LOOP AT it_errors. LOOP AT it_errors. WRITE: WRITE: /15(33) it_errors-matnr, /15(33) it_errors-matnr, 38(55) it_errors-menge, 38(55) it_errors-menge, 75(132) it_errors-error_text. 75(132) it_errors-error_text. ENDLOOP. ENDLOOP. NEW-PAGE PRINT OFF. NEW-PAGE PRINT OFF. Looking forward to assign a name to this created error file, say, my_error_spool_file. So, when the Z prog. creates a file in the SPOOL, it shuld create with the name of my_error_spool_file, always, so, pls. suggest me. thanq Edited by: SAP ABAPer on Aug 5, 2008 8:38 PM Edited by: SAP ABAPer on Aug 5, 2008 8:40 PM

answers.text: Hi , Please use the following function module.. This might help you.. CALL FUNCTION 'RSPO_SET_ATTRIBUTES_SPOOLJOB' EXPORTING rqident = ADD = IMPORTING RQ = tables attributes = EXCEPTIONS NO_SUCH_JOB = 1 NO_PERMISSION = 2 JOB_FINAL = 3 INCOMPLETE = 4 OTHERS = 5 . In the RSPOATTR try changing the name and passing it to the FM.. Spool name is stored as TSP01-RQ0NAME Thank you

data.title: How to get the  table  name of value field...or if anyone of them know  which FM producing  Value  Field in KEA6  T-code

qas.question: Hi Guru's, How to get the table name of value field when i went KEA6 T-code i have select " value fields from op. concern" and i gave it the concern name "IDEA" and click display. when i try to see the table name of value field with help of Presed F1 and i saw its not displaying any table name and field name is not present in technical info..and i went debuging i try to find the FM name also but i could nt find there ...My requirment is displaying the value field and coreesponding description in ALV report .. so can anyone tell me the FM name or solution for that where i have to fetch the data.. Thanx in advance.........

answers.text: Hi Srithar, The table name for the above transaction code is TKEBB - Management for Operating Concerns (Cross-Client) and the field for the value fields from Op.concerns is ERKRS. Let me know if you have any queries and appreciate if it helps.

data.title: find which  viewes avialable for material

qas.question: Hi, how to find which are all viewes aviable for a material. Thanks in advance. Ramkrishnaiah Y

answers.text: Check the field PSTAT and/or VPSTA of MARA: the value of these field should be a sequence of letters, each letter should indicate an active view: A Work scheduling B Accounting C Classification D MRP E Purchasing F Production resources/tools G Costing K Basic data L Storage P Forecasting Q Quality management S Warehouse management V Sales X Plant stocks Z Storage location stocks Reward Points if useful

data.title: Which property is the unique identity for a company beside DB name

qas.question: Hi everyone, I would like to distinguish the company, I know for a company DB name is unique,however, database can be restored from other company database. is there any information for one company cannot be changed from SAP UI once it created, and when company DB restored from other company DB, I can compare the new value with last I saved value and know this database different with the original company database. I have considered about company name, in different company DB the company name different, but company name can be changed from SAP B1 Company details window. In one words, I want to know which is the company level identity. Thinks in advance! Kathy

answers.text: Hi Kathy, To my knowledge there's no unique identifier. However, it seems that you cannot change the company address (OADM.CompnyAddr) - at least in 2005 SP01; maybe this could help? In addition there are a couple of other settings which cannot be changed once set and transactions booked... Would that give you a bit of what you want? Regards, Frank

data.title: GL display for inventory account which are not defined as line item display

qas.question: Hi All, We have inventory gl accounts which are auto post accounts , these accounts get posted when grn is done. these accounts are not defined as line item display accounts, but if we execute the T code: FS10 we get the gl balance display and not line item display. Our requirement is that we should be able to view the line item display matching the GL account balance in that GL account. Can we get the report in MM module line items wise display. Regards Prashant P. Zinge

answers.text: Hello, You should use RFSEPA01 program via execute SE38 transaction. This program activate line item for each account. Activation means, this program generate line items to BSIS table. So that after this program running, you can see line items in FBL3N. Regards, Burak
